content:
Villa Mar y Palma is a stunning oceanfront luxury villa located in the prestigious Casa de Campo Resort in the Dominican Republic. This exquisite villa boasts magnificent views of the Caribbean Sea and offers the perfect combination of privacy, luxury, and comfort.

Ideal for golf lovers, Villa Mar y Palma is situated just steps away from the resort's famous Teeth of the Dog golf course, designed by Pete Dye. The villa offers direct access to the course, making it the perfect destination for golf enthusiasts looking to combine their love of the sport with a luxurious getaway.

This exclusive villa is designed with the utmost attention to detail, featuring six spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a modern fully equipped kitchen, an expansive living room, and an outdoor terrace with a private swimming pool. The villa's sleek and sophisticated design combines the beauty of traditional Caribbean architecture with modern comforts and amenities.

Guests of Villa Mar y Palma can enjoy a range of luxurious amenities, including a private butler, daily housekeeping, and access to the exclusive Casa de Campo Resort facilities, including a private beach, restaurants, and a spa.

Whether you're looking to relax and unwind or enjoy an active vacation, Villa Mar y Palma offers the perfect combination of luxury and convenience. With its stunning oceanfront location, access to world-class golf courses, and exceptional amenities, this villa is an ideal destination for anyone looking for an unforgettable getaway in the Caribbean.
